name: Hardest Rider vs Hopeful
description: The Hardest rider is in control now! Play as the mysterious rider is a slew of ridiculous scenarios that range from encounters seen in Lisa the Hopeful,  to old encounters with new twists, to encounters that are totally fresh. Swap stances to gain access to new skills and statistical advantages, and summon clones of yourself to even the odds! (The game is currently in development with three battles, more to come.) Show the world who is truly the highway king!
